name: Oven
description: You find an open deck oven. It's fires are still roaring and show no signs of cooling down. Upon peering into it, you notice the shadow of a tool behind the burnt debris collected at the front.

reach.success: You successfully grab the tool and add it to your inventory.
reach.immune: You reach into the oven, confident in your protection. You pocket the tool without any worries.
reach.fail: Your forearm makes contact with the deck, burning you and dealing damage

results.leave: The oven looks too hot, and you aren't equipped to handle this. You peace out.
